mainBoard.flavorText:
"Do not fall into the trap of thinking you understand the kami. Cannot a drop of water be dew on the meadow, a glacier's thaw, or the tear of a child?"
—Sensei Hisoka

foreignData.flavorText:
„Gehe nicht in die Falle, zu denken, du verstündest die Kami. Kann ein Tropfen Wasser nicht sowohl Tau auf der Wiese, Gletscherschmelze als auch die Träne eines Kindes sein?"
—Sensei Hisoka
foreignData.name: Tränen-Kami
foreignData.text: Opfere den Tränen-Kami: Tappe oder enttappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl.

foreignData.flavorText:
"No caigas en la trampa de pensar que entiendes a los kami. ¿Acaso una gota de agua no puede ser rocío de la llanura, el deshielo de un glaciar o la lágrima de un niño?"
—Sensei Hisoka
foreignData.name: Kami de la lágrima
foreignData.text: Sacrificar el Kami de la lágrima: Gira o endereza la criatura objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Ne tombe pas dans le piège de penser que tu comprends les kami. Une goutte d'eau peut être la rosée dans les prés, le dégel d'un glacier ou la larme d'un enfant. »
—Sensei Hisoka
foreignData.name: Kami de larme
foreignData.text: Sacrifiez le Kami de larme : Engagez ou dégagez la créature ciblée.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Non cadere nell'errore di credere di capire i kami. Non può forse una goccia d'acqua essere la rugiada sul prato, il disgelo di un ghiacciaio o la lacrima di un bambino?"
—Sensei Hisoka
foreignData.name: Kami delle Lacrime
foreignData.text: Sacrifica il Kami delle Lacrime: TAPpa o STAPpa una creatura bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText:
神を理解しようなどという考えに落ちることなかれ。 一滴の水とて、草の露や氷河の雪解けや稚児の涙となりえように？
――密師範
foreignData.name: 涙の神
foreignData.text: 涙の神を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップまたはアンタップする。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText:
"Não caia na armadilha de achar que entendes os kamis. Não pode uma gota d'água refrescar a campina, um degelo glacial, ou a lágrima de uma criança?"
— Sensei Hisoka
foreignData.name: Kami da Lágrima
foreignData.text: Sacrifique Kami da Lágrima: Vira ou desvira a criatura alvo.

foreignData.flavorText:
「常见的思考陷阱就是以为自己了解神明。 谁说一滴水不能是牧地上的露珠，冰河的融霜，或孩童的眼泪？」
～密师范
foreignData.name: 泪珠神
foreignData.text: 牺牲泪珠神：横置或重置目标生物。

mainBoard.name: Teardrop Kami
mainBoard.text: Sacrifice Teardrop Kami: You may tap or untap target creature.

mainBoard.flavorText: When it's finished, all that's left of you is a ripple on a still pond.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn er mit dir fertig ist, bleibt von dir nicht mehr als eine leichte Kräuselung auf einem stillen Teich.
foreignData.name: Kaijin des Verschwindenlassens
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger (Diese Kreatur kann nicht angreifen.)
Immer wenn der Kaijin des Verschwindenlassens eine Kreatur blockt, bringe diese Kreatur am Ende des Kampfes auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. (Bringe sie nur zurück, falls sie im Spiel ist.)

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando termina, todo lo que queda de ti es una onda en un estanque tranquilo.
foreignData.name: Kaijin del toque desvanecedor
foreignData.text:
Defensor (Esta criatura no puede atacar.)
Siempre que la Kaijin del toque desvanecedor bloquee a una criatura, regresa esa criatura a la mano de su propietario al final del combate. (Regrésalo sólo si está en juego.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quand elle en a fini, il ne reste plus de vous qu'un remous à la surface de la mare.
foreignData.name: Kaijin au toucher évaporant
foreignData.text:
Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.)
À chaque fois que la Kaijin au toucher évaporant bloque une créature, renvoyez celle-ci dans la main de son propriétaire à la fin du combat. (Renvoyez-la seulement si elle est en jeu.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quando ha finito, di te resta solo un'increspatura in una pozza immobile.
foreignData.name: Kaijin dal Tocco Evanescente
foreignData.text:
Difensore (Questa creatura non può attaccare.)
Ogniqualvolta la Kaijin dal Tocco Evanescente blocca una creatura, il proprietario riprende in mano quella creatura alla fine del combattimento. (Soltanto se è in gioco.)

foreignData.flavorText: 終りを迎えた時、お前は静かな池の中のさざ波としてしか残らない。
foreignData.name: 消し去りの水神
foreignData.text:
防衛（このクリーチャーは攻撃に参加できない。）
消し去りの水神がいずれかのクリーチャーをブロックするたび、戦闘終了時にそのクリーチャーをオーナーの手札に戻す。 （場にある場合にのみ戻す。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText: Quando isso terminar, tudo que restará de você será uma ondulação em um lago sereno.
foreignData.name: Kaijin do Toque Evanescente
foreignData.text:
Defensor (Esta criatura não pode atacar.)
Toda vez que Kaijin do Toque Evanescente bloquear uma criatura, devolva aquela criatura para a mão de seu dono no final do combate. (Devolva-a apenas se ela estiver em jogo.)

foreignData.flavorText: 最终，你不过是静谧池塘上的一圈涟漪。
foreignData.name: 无踪水神
foreignData.text:
守军（此生物不能攻击）
每当无踪水神阻挡某生物，在战斗结束时将该生物移回其拥有者手上。 （若它在场，才将其移回手上）

mainBoard.name: Kaijin of the Vanishing Touch
mainBoard.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Kaijin of the Vanishing Touch blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat. (Return it only if it's on the battlefield.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

foreignData.flavorText: Der aus Fäden der Geisterwelt gewobene Tarnmantel machte seinen Träger unsichtbar, ging aber viel zu schnell kaputt.
foreignData.name: Minamo-Blickebieger
foreignData.text: {X}, {T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke X oder weniger ist in diesem Zug unblockbar.

foreignData.flavorText: Tejida con hilos del mundo espiritual, la capa de niebla hace invisible a su portador, pero rápidamente se deshace en jirones.
foreignData.name: Tuercevisión de Minamo
foreignData.text: {X}, {T}: La criatura objetivo de fuerza X o menos es imbloqueable este turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Faite de fibres du monde spirituel, la capebrume rendait son porteur invisible, mais elle tombait rapidement en loques.
foreignData.name: Plieur de vue de Minamo
foreignData.text: {X}, {T} : La créature ciblée de force X ou moins est imblocable ce tour-ci.

foreignData.flavorText: Tessuto con fili del mondo spirituale, il nubemanto rendeva invisibile chi lo indossava ma si riduceva rapidamente a brandelli.
foreignData.name: Volgisguardo di Minamo
foreignData.text: {X}, {T}: La creatura bersaglio con forza pari o inferiore a X non può essere bloccata in questo turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 精霊界の糸で編まれた霞衣は着た者を見えなくするが、それはあっという間にボロボロになってしまう。
foreignData.name: 水面院の視線曲げ
foreignData.text: {X}, {T}：パワーがX以下のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。このターン、それはブロックされない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: Tecido pelos fios do mundo dos espíritos, o manto de névoa tornava invisível quem o vestia, mas rapidamente ficou em pedaços.
foreignData.name: Refrator de Minamo
foreignData.text: {X}, {T}: A criatura alvo com poder menor ou igual a X não pode ser bloqueada neste turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 此雾篷系以灵界丝线织成，穿戴之后即可隐形，但很快便会碎散一地。
foreignData.name: 水面院曲相师
foreignData.text: {X}，{T}：目标力量小于或等于X的生物本回合中不能被阻挡。

mainBoard.name: Minamo Sightbender
mainBoard.text: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: "You hide your actions from eyes on the ground, but nothing escapes the clouds."

foreignData.flavorText: „Auch wenn du deine Aktionen vor Beobachtern am Boden verbirgst nichts entgeht den Wolken."
foreignData.name: Soratami-Wolkenwandernde
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
{2}, bringe ein Land, das du kontrollierst, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück: Ziehe eine Karte und wirf dann eine Karte ab.

foreignData.flavorText: "Puedes esconder tus acciones en el suelo, pero nada escapa a las nubes."
foreignData.name: Deslizanubes soratami
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
{2}, regresar una tierra que controles a la mano de su propietario: Roba una carta, luego descarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Vous cachez vos actes à tous les regards au sol, mais rien n'échappe aux nuages. »
foreignData.name: Pastenuage soratami
foreignData.text:
Vol
{2}, Renvoyez un terrain que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire : Piochez une carte et défaussez-vous ensuite d'une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Nascondi le tue azioni agli occhi della terra, ma nulla sfugge alle nuvole."
foreignData.name: Scivolanubi Soratami
foreignData.text:
Volare
{2}, Il proprietario riprende in mano una terra che tu controlli: Pesca una carta, poi scarta una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 地上の眼からは隠れて事を為すもできようが、雲からは逃れられぬ。
foreignData.name: 空民の雲乗り
foreignData.text:
飛行
{2}, あなたがコントロールする土地を１枚、オーナーの手札に戻す：カードを１枚引き、その後カードを１枚捨てる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ムーンフォーク・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: "Você esconde suas ações de olhos que estão no chão, mas nada escapa às nuvens".
foreignData.name: Desliza-Nuvens Soratami
foreignData.text:
Voar
{2}, Devolva um terreno que você controla para a mão de seu dono: Compre um card e depois descarte um card.

foreignData.flavorText: 「你避得开地上的眼睛，也逃不过天上的云。」
foreignData.name: 翔云空民
foreignData.text:
飞行
{2}，将由你操控的一个地移回其拥有者手上：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Soratami Cloudskater
mainBoard.text:
Flying
{2}, Return a land you control to its owner's hand: Draw a card, then discard a card.

mainBoard.name: Student of Elements // Tobita, Master of Winds
mainBoard.text: When Student of Elements has flying, flip it.

foreignData.name: Nebelklingen-Shinobi
foreignData.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}. Bringe einen ungeblockten Angreifer, den du kontrollierst, auf deine Hand zurück: Bringe diese Karte aus deiner Hand getappt und angreifend ins Spiel.)
Immer wenn der Nebelklingen-Shinobi einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kannst du eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die dieser Spieler kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurückbringen.

foreignData.name: Shinobi hojaniebla
foreignData.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, regresar un atacante no bloqueado que controles a la mano de su propietario: Pon esta carta en juego de tu mano girada y atacando).
Siempre que el Shinobi hojaniebla haga daño de combate a un jugador, puedes regresar la criatura objetivo que controle ese jugador a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.name: Shinobi brumelame
foreignData.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Renvoyez en main un attaquant non-bloqué que vous contrôlez : Mettez en jeu cette carte, engagée et attaquante, depuis votre main.)
À chaque fois que le Shinobi brumelame inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, vous pouvez renvoyer la créature ciblée contrôlée par ce joueur dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Shinobi Foscalama
foreignData.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Il proprietario riprende in mano una creatura attaccante non bloccata che tu controlli: Metti in gioco questa carta dalla tua mano, TAPpata e attaccante.)
Ogniqualvolta lo Shinobi Foscalama infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, puoi far riprendere in mano al proprietario una creatura bersaglio che quel giocatore controlla.

foreignData.name: 霧刃の忍び
foreignData.text:
忍術 {U} （{U}, あなたがコントロールするブロックされていない攻撃クリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻す：このカードをタップ状態の攻撃クリーチャーとして場に出す。）
霧刃の忍びがいずれかのプレイヤーに戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、クリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたはそれをオーナーの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・忍者

foreignData.name: Shinobi da Lâmina de Névoa
foreignData.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Devolva para a mão um atacante que você controla que não tenha sido bloqueado: Coloque este card em jogo, de sua mão, virado e atacando.)
Toda vez que Shinobi da Lâmina de Névoa causar dano de combate a um jogador, você pode devolver a criatura alvo que aquele jogador controla para a mão de seu dono.

foreignData.name: 灭雾忍者
foreignData.text:
忍术{U} ({U}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置进场，且正进行攻击。）
每当灭雾忍者对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以将目标由该牌手操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

mainBoard.name: Mistblade Shinobi
mainBoard.text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Mistblade Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Since the war began, fishermen don't sing to the kaijin to ask for full nets. They guard the shore with thrice-blessed spears, saving the nets for their wives to pack their belongings and leave."
—Hayato, master sailor

foreignData.flavorText:
„Seit der Krieg begonnen hat, singen die Fischer nicht mehr zu den Kaijin, um um volle Netze zu bitten. Sie bewachen die Küste mit dreifach gesegneten Speeren und lassen ihre Netze bei ihren Frauen, damit die ihre Besitztümer packen und die Gegend verlassen können."
—Hayato, Segelmeister
foreignData.name: Fluss-Kaijin

foreignData.flavorText:
"Desde el comienzo de la guerra, los pescadores no le cantan a los kaijin pidiéndoles redes llenas. Montan guardia en las orillas con lanzas bendecidas tres veces, y dejan las redes a sus esposas para que guarden en ellas todas sus pertenencias en preparación para la partida."
—Hayato, marino experto
foreignData.name: Kaijin del río

foreignData.flavorText:
« Depuis la guerre, les pêcheurs ne chantent plus aux kaijin pour qu'ils remplissent leurs filets. Ils surveillent le rivage armés de lances bénies par trois fois, et leurs femmes utilisent les filets pour prendre leurs affaires avant de quitter les lieux. »
—Hayato, maître marin
foreignData.name: Kaijin de rivière

foreignData.flavorText:
"Da quando la guerra è cominciata, i pescatori hanno smesso di cantare ai kaijin per chiedere reti piene. Sorvegliano le coste con lance tre volte benedette e lasciano le reti alle loro mogli per raccogliere ciò che possiedono e andarsene."
—Hayato, mastro marinaio
foreignData.name: Kaijin del Fiume

foreignData.flavorText:
戦が始まって以来、魚獲りが大漁を願って海神の歌を歌うこともなくなった。彼らはその三倍も祝福された槍を構えて岸を守り、嫁さんが荷物を抱えて逃げられるために網を使うんだから。
――船乗りの達人、速人
foreignData.name: 川の海神
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.flavorText:
"Desde o início da guerra, os pescadores não cantam aos kaijins para pedir redes fartas. Eles guardam a costa com lanças triplamente abençoadas, reservando as redes para que suas esposas guardem seus pertences e partam".
— Hayato, mestre marinheiro
foreignData.name: Kaijin do Rio

foreignData.flavorText:
「打从战争开始以来，渔夫便不再歌颂海神以求满载而归。他们以三福长矛保卫沿岸，将网子交给妻小打包行李，之后离乡远行。」
～老水手速人
foreignData.name: 河神

mainBoard.name: River Kaijin

foreignData.text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}. Bringe einen ungeblockten Angreifer, den du kontrollierst, auf deine Hand zurück: Bringe diese Karte aus deiner Hand getappt und angreifend ins Spiel.)
Immer wenn der Kenner der geheimen Pfade einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, schaue dir die Karten auf der Hand dieses Spielers an.
{1}{U}: Bringe einen Ninja deiner Wahl, den du kontrollierst, auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück. Spiele diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Zuges.

foreignData.name: 深夜忍者
foreignData.text:
忍术{1}{U} ({1}{U}，将一个由你操控且未受阻挡的攻击生物移回其拥有者手上：将此牌从你手上横置进场，且正进行攻击。）
每当深夜忍者对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。

mainBoard.name: Ninja of the Deep Hours

rulings.text: The ninjutsu ability can be activated only after blockers have been declared. Before then, attacking creatures are neither blocked nor unblocked.

As you activate a ninjutsu ability, you reveal the Ninja card in your hand and return the attacking creature. The Ninja isn’t put onto the battlefield until the ability resolves. If it leaves your hand before then, it won’t enter the battlefield at all.
The creature put onto the battlefield with ninjutsu enters the battlefield attacking the same player or planeswalker that the returned creature was attacking. This is a rule specific to ninjutsu.
Although the Ninja is attacking, it was never declared as an attacking creature (for purposes of abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks, for example).

The ninjutsu ability can be activated during the declare blockers step, combat damage step, or end of combat step. If you wait until after the declare blockers step, because all combat damage is dealt at once, the Ninja won’t normally deal combat damage.

If a creature in combat has first strike or double strike, you can activate the ninjutsu ability during the first-strike combat damage step. The Ninja will deal combat damage during the regular combat damage step in this case, even if it has first strike.

mainBoard.text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

Immer wenn Higure einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Ninja-Karte durchsuchen, sie offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Falls du dies tust, mische danach deine Bibliothek.

Siempre que Higure haga daño de combate a un jugador, puedes buscar una carta de Ninja en tu biblioteca, mostrarla y ponerla en tu mano. Si lo haces, baraja tu biblioteca.
{2}: El Ninja objetivo es imbloqueable este turno.

À chaque fois que Higure, le vent immobile inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, vous pouvez chercher une carte de ninja dans votre bibliothèque, la révéler et la mettre dans votre main. Si vous faites ainsi, mélangez votre bibliothèque.
{2} : Le ninja ciblé est imblocable ce tour-ci.

Ogniqualvolta Higure infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio, scegliere una carta Ninja, rivelarla e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Se lo fai, rimescola il tuo grimorio.
{2}: Il Ninja bersaglio non può essere bloccato in questo turno.

静風の日暮がいずれかのプレイヤーにダメージを与えるたび、あなたは自分のライブラリーから忍者カードを１枚探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。 そうした場合、あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

每当日暮对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张忍者牌，展示该牌，并置于你手上。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。
{2}：目标忍者本回合不能被阻挡。

mainBoard.name: Higure, the Still Wind

rulings.text: If Higure deals regular combat damage and you use its ability to search for another Ninja, that card won’t be in your hand in time to activate its ninjutsu ability to put it onto the battlefield and deal damage. However, the card you searched for could still be swapped for an unblocked creature, including Higure, as long as you activate its ninjutsu ability before the end of combat.

If Higure deals first strike damage (or the first part of double strike damage), the triggered ability would resolve before regular combat damage, and the searched-for Ninja would be able to get swapped with an unblocked creature and still deal its regular damage.

mainBoard.text:
Ninjutsu {2}{U}{U} ({2}{U}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Higure, the Still Wind deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a Ninja card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{2}: Target Ninja creature can't be blocked this turn.

foreignData.name: Tomorrow, Azamis Vertrauter
foreignData.text: Falls du eine Karte ziehen würdest, schaue dir stattdessen die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine dieser Karten auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignData.name: Mañana, familiar de Azami
foreignData.text: Si fueras a robar una carta, en vez de eso, mira las primeras tres cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca. Pon una de esas cartas en tu mano y el resto, en la parte inferior de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignData.name: Demain, familier d'Azami
foreignData.text: Si vous deviez piocher une carte, regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque à la place. Mettez l'une de ces cartes dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans n'importe quel ordre.

foreignData.name: Domani, Famiglio di Azami
foreignData.text: Se stai per pescare una carta, guarda invece le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungi alla tua mano una di quelle carte e metti le rimanenti in fondo al tuo grimorio nell'ordine che preferisci.

foreignData.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — スピリット

foreignData.name: 梓纱佣兽明日歌
foreignData.text: 若你将抓一张牌，则改为检视你牌库顶的三张牌。 将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

mainBoard.name: Tomorrow, Azami's Familiar

rulings.text: Tomorrow’s ability makes you look at the top three cards, not draw them. Therefore it won’t trigger abilities that trigger when cards are drawn.
Having multiple Tomorrows on the battlefield does nothing extra.

If you would draw two cards, you look at the top three cards of your library, keep one, and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Then you look at the new top three cards of your library, keep one, and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
If you have fewer than three cards in your library, you keep one and put the rest back. If you have no cards in your library, you do nothing.
Since Tomorrow replaces all your card drawing with looking at cards, you can’t lose the game by being required to draw more cards than are in your library with Tomorrow on the battlefield.

mainBoard.text: If you would draw a card, look at the top three cards of your library instead. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

エンチャントされている島がいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、あなたは滝の源獣をあなたの墓地から手札に戻してもよい。

mainBoard.name: Genju of the Falls

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

Activating the ability that turns it into a creature while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power and/or toughness to a specific number. However, any effect that raises or lowers power and/or toughness (such as the effect created by Giant Growth, Glorious Anthem, or a +1/+1 counter) will continue to apply.

mainBoard.text:
Enchant Island
{2}: Enchanted Island becomes a 3/2 blue Spirit creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
When enchanted Island is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Falls from your graveyard to your hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: Many kami could fly, which put some warriors at a distinct disadvantage. The mages of Minamo took it upon themselves to correct that imbalance.

mainBoard.name: Lifted by Clouds

rulings.text: You reveal all cards you intend to splice at the same time. Each individual card can be spliced only once onto any one spell.
A card with a splice ability can’t be spliced onto itself because the spell is on the stack (and not in your hand) when you reveal the cards you want to splice onto it.

You choose all targets for the spell after revealing cards you want to splice, including any targets required by the text of any of those cards. You may choose a different target for each instance of the word “target” on the resulting spell.
If all of the spell’s targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen.

mainBoard.text:
Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
Splice onto Arcane {1}{U} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Do not react to force in kind. Turn it aside. Direct it to where it can do no harm."
—Meloku the Clouded Mirror

foreignData.flavorText:
„Reagiere auf keine Art der Gewalt. Lasse sie abtropfen. Lenke sie dorthin, wo sie keinen Schaden anrichten kann."
—Meloku, der bewölkte Spiegel
foreignData.name: Hindern

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.name: Obstacle

mainBoard.text: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put that card on the top or bottom of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

mainBoard.flavorText: Like storm water through the segments of bamboo, the spell followed the links of magic. Then it destroyed them.

foreignData.flavorText: Wie Monsunregen durch die Bambusrohre rinnt, so folgte der Zauber dem Stromlauf der Magie. Schließlich zerstörte er alle.

foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Der Beherrscher dieses Zauberspruchs zeigt die Karten auf seiner Hand offen vor und wirft dann alle Karten ab, die denselben Namen haben wie die an diesen Zauberspruch gekoppelten Karten.

foreignData.flavorText: Como el agua de tormenta por los segmentos del bambú, el hechizo sigue los rastros de la magia. Y luego los destruye.

foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. El controlador de ese hechizo muestra su mano, luego descarta cada carta con el mismo nombre que la carta empalmada en ese hechizo.

foreignData.flavorText: Le sort suivit les liens magiques comme l'eau circulant dans les segments de bambou. Puis il les détruisit.

foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Le contrôleur de ce sort révèle sa main et se défausse ensuite de chaque carte ayant le même nom qu'une carte imprégnée sur ce sort.

foreignData.flavorText: Come l'acqua di una tempesta tra i segmenti di bambù, il sortilegio seguì i legami della magia. E poi li distrusse.
foreignData.name: Ingerenza di Minamo
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Il controllore di quella magia rivela la propria mano, quindi scarta ogni carta con lo stesso nome di una carta unita a quella magia.

foreignData.text: Anula a mágica alvo. O controlador daquela mágica revela a sua própria mão e depois descarta todos os cards com o mesmo nome de um card unido àquela mágica.

foreignData.flavorText: 此咒语循魔力踪迹前行，宛如洪流随竹渠而至； 随后便将其消灭。

mainBoard.name: Minamo's Meddling
mainBoard.text: Counter target spell. That spell's controller reveals their hand, then discards each card with the same name as a card spliced onto that spell.

foreignData.name: Mystische Beschränkungen
foreignData.text:
Du kannst die Mystischen Beschränkungen immer dann spielen, falls du auch einen Spontanzauber spielen könntest.
Wenn die Mystischen Beschränkungen ins Spiel kommen, tappe die verzauberte Kreatur.
Die verzauberte Kreatur enttappt nicht während des Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.

foreignData.name: Restricción mística
foreignData.text:
Puedes jugar la Restricción mística en cualquier momento en que pudieras jugar un instantáneo.
Cuando la Restricción mística entre en juego, gira la criatura encantada.
La criatura encantada no se endereza durante el paso de enderezar de su controlador.

foreignData.name: Restrictions mystiques
foreignData.text:
Vous pouvez jouer les Restrictions mystiques à tout moment où vous pourriez jouer un éphémère.
Quand les Restrictions mystiques arrivent en jeu, engagez la créature enchantée.
La créature enchantée ne se dégage pas pendant l'étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Lacci Mistici
foreignData.text:
Puoi giocare i Lacci Mistici in qualsiasi momento in cui potresti giocare un istantaneo.
Quando i Lacci Mistici entrano in gioco, TAPpa la creatura incantata.
La creatura incantata non STAPpa durante lo STAP del proprio controllore.

foreignData.name: 秘教の抑制
foreignData.text:
あなたは秘教の抑制を、あなたがインスタントをプレイできるときならいつでもプレイしてよい。
秘教の抑制が場に出たとき、エンチャントされているクリーチャーをタップする。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーのアンタップ･ステップにアンタップしない。

Quando Restrições Místicas entra em jogo, vira a criatura encantada.
A criatura encantada não desvira durante a etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.
